subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance User Group Boston
body:
Dear all:

IBPSA-Boston is setting up a series of user groups on various modeling topics such as CFD, eQuest and RADIANCE. If anybody is interested organizing/joining the latter, please contact Connor Jansen at (connor.jansen at wspfk.com<mailto:connor.jansen at wspfk.com>). I believe that the User Group Kick-Off meeting has been tentatively scheduled for the 18th of July at 7 - 8:30 PM at the WSP Flack and Kurtz office at 88 Black Falcon Drive STE 210 in Boston.

Best,

Christoph
